mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Musers (user_id, user_pw, user_phone1, user_name, user_phone2, user_email1, user_email2, addr_basic, addr_detail, addr_zip_num) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userPhone1}, #{userName}, #{userPhone2}, #{userEmail1}, #{userEmail2}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail}, #{addrZipNum})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Musers WHERE user_id = #{id}
SELECT user_pw FROM Musers WHERE user_id = #{id}

SELECT user_name, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_email1, user_email2, addr_basic, addr_detail, addr_zip_num, f.bno, f.title, f.reg_date FROM users u LEFT JOIN freeboard f ON u.user_id = f.writer WHERE u.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY f.bno DESC LIMIT #{paging.pageStart}, #{paging.cpp};
mapper.update: UPDATE Musers SET upload_path = #{uploadPath}, file_loca = #{fileLoca}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_real_name = #{fileRealName}, user_nick=#{userNick}, message=#{message} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
